introduction: LEATHER is a comedy that portrays the life of our protagonist, Josemi (played by actor César Rosado), an executive of around thirty, submissive, insecure and cowardly nature that is trapped between an overbearing mother and a competitive work environment and voracious where there is only room for the "leaders", but a chance encounter one night gets its hands something that will encourage you to enter a gay leather fetish club and change the course of his life.
